original_text: “Speak to the Israelites and say to them: ‘When anyone among you brings an offering to the Lord, bring as your offering an animal from either the herd or the flock.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 너희 중에 누구든지 여호와께 예물을 드리려거든 가축 중에서 소나 양으로 예물을 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: When anyone among you brings an offering to the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 누군가 주께 예물을 드릴 때에

sentences.original_text: bring as your offering an animal
from either the herd or the flock.
